sentences.en: All actual objects are concrete.
sentences.cn: 一切实际存在的物体都是具体的.

sentences.en: Any resemblance to actual persons, places or events is purely coincidental.
sentences.cn: 如与真人、真实地点或真实事件有雷同之处，纯属巧合。

sentences.en: Check the actual construction of the chair by looking underneath.
sentences.cn: 看看椅子的下面，检查一下它的实际构造。

sentences.en: For some people, reading travel books is a surrogate for actual travel.
sentences.cn: 对某些人来说, 读游记可代替真正的旅行.

sentences.en: He pleaded guilty to causing actual bodily harm.
sentences.cn: 他承认确实犯有人身伤害罪。

sentences.en: I can not give the actual figures.
sentences.cn: 我不能举出实际数字.

sentences.en: I know Germany won, but I can’t tell you the actual score.
sentences.cn: 我知道德国队胜了，但我不知道确切的比分。

sentences.en: I’m not joking. Those were his actual words.
sentences.cn: 我没开玩笑，那都是他的原话。

sentences.en: In actual fact (=  really  ) , there is little evidence to support the allegations.
sentences.cn: 事实上，这些指控几乎没有证据支持。

sentences.en: In actual fact (= really  ) , there is little evidence to support the allegations.
sentences.cn: 事实上，这些指控几乎没有证据支持。

sentences.en: Interest is only charged on the actual amount borrowed.
sentences.cn: 利息只按实际借款额收取。

sentences.en: is this a drop of your actual feminine intuition?.
sentences.cn: 这真是你的一点女性直觉吗？。

sentences.en: It calls for actual deeds and not flowery language.
sentences.cn: 需要的是实际行动,而不是漂亮的辞藻.

sentences.en: Our efforts are beginning to have an actual effect.
sentences.cn: 我们的努力开始有了实效.

sentences.en: people talk as if he was a monster—in actual fact he was a very kind guy.
sentences.cn: 人们谈起他来好像他是个怪物——但实际上他是个很好的人。

sentences.en: The actual cause awaits further investigation.
sentences.cn: 究系何因,尚待深查.

sentences.en: The actual demands set out in the document are small beer indeed.
sentences.cn: 文件中陈述的实际要求确实是无关紧要的.

sentences.en: The actual nest is a work of art.
sentences.cn: 真实的鸟巢十分精致。

sentences.en: The segments are filmed using either local actors or the actual people involved.
sentences.cn: 这些片断是由当地的演员或真实的当事人参与拍摄的。

sentences.en: We learned by actual experience that practice makes perfect.
sentences.cn: 我们从实际经验中认识到熟能生巧.

sentences.en: What she said is the actual situation.
sentences.cn: 她讲的确系实情.

sentences.en: What were his actual words?
sentences.cn: 他的原话是什么？

words.tran_cn: 成为现实；发挥出潜力（等于actualize）
实行；使成现实；发挥出…的潜力

phrases.tran_cn: 实际上（用于强调一意见，尤指更改先前或与先前所说相抵触的言论）
(非正式)真实的，真正的，重要的

trans.tran_en: used to emphasize that something is real or exact
